reviews.review:
valve他妈的就是世界的主宰

----------------------------


lvl our benefactor，不忍卒玩。一边再放下休息的时候心心念念干不了其他事，一边在拿起来玩的时候因将要结束而惆怅。

----------------------------

通关了，怅然若失。

结尾两关真的是太精彩了。所有武器被没收，结果重力枪进化成力场枪能直接把人吸过来，最后两关的战斗真的是整个游戏里最最爽快的关卡了。boss是一个很简单的机制，哼哈二船也就是装个样子不至于太简单。留悬念的标准完美结局。

我其实也很想吹结尾的场景布置，钢铁洪流，进入传送胶囊一览设备内部的恐怖实验；被捉、反转、追逐breen，跳机关爬上高塔，然后挫败邪恶阴谋。但这样就对游戏的其他部分很不公平。

整个游戏分为几个部分，他们之间风格迥异。有逃离乌托邦的枪战，有两栖赛艇，有公路赛车，有万圣夜打僵尸，甚至还能召唤无限复活的宝宝！搭配重力枪和远超时代直逼天际的物理引擎，整个游戏就像暑假作业那么充实。

我之前也很喜欢1代。虽然我玩的是black mesa，但这并不妨碍我体验原汁原味的关卡设置和枪械手感，天马行空的想象，始终充满悬念的剧情，以及我最喜欢的解谜部分。我本以为1代已经是放在今天依然不过时的射击游戏巅峰，没想到2代能更上一层楼，超越神作超越自己。

valve就是这样永远能给你惊喜的公司，当你以为这是巅峰，其实只是一个开始。他拥有卓越的创作实力，又有能够自我超越的能力。g胖不需要数3，因为12已经足够证明自己了。

----------------------------------------------

海清：G胖，我的神！
搞不懂玩传送门泰坦陨落消光这些游戏不会晕3D，玩半条命2却晕头转向1

Half-Life 2 is one of the highest rated games out there as of today. If you, by any rare chance, have little to no idea why this game receives the praise that it does, then I'll try to brief you as to why it stands out, even among the "masterpieces" of today.

This game never takes control away from you. Ever. It's a consistently entertaining 10+ hour experience, where the only break in gameplay are mere second-long pauses between sections when a loading screen pops up. Valve stripped everything that could possibly take you out of the experience away, and immersed players into a (for 2004 at least) graphically pleasing and detailed world filled with interesting characters.

And yet, despite Valve having showed the game industry how it's done 18 years ago, we're still being bombarded by shit releases whose "action" is either hot scripted garbage or an unpolished mess. Garbage one-liners, HUD elements constantly reminding the player where to go, puzzles which a twitching half-dead 25 IQ brain hooked up to a heart-lung machine could solve, you name it.

Playing this game for the first time just a few hours ago however, I was blown away by how so little can add up to so much. While it's not one of my favourites, and while I'll most likely have forgotten about it and moved on to something else within a week, I believe everyone should experience the high points that this game has to offer for themselves.

And if not for my meager words, I'm sure the collossal amount of attention you've seen this game receive from others will convince you to check it out at some point.

Always been told this game was a classic so I decided to play it.
Great pacing, great atmosphere, great gameplay.
Interesting, compelling, and fun all the way through.

Efsaneler efsanesi Half-Life serisinin Gordon perspektifinden devamı Half-Life 2... 

Hikaye:

"Kalkın ve harekete geçin Bay Freeman, kalkın ve harekete geçin." repliğiyle uyanıyoruz 20 yıllık uykumuzdan. İlk Half-Life oyununun, Half-Life: Blue Shift'in başladığı; Half-Life: Opposing Force'da ise kaçmak için kullandığımız o bitmek bilmez ama bir o kadar da nostaljik olan Black Mesa trenini andırır bir biçimde, bir trende uyanıyoruz. 

Böyle başlıyor maceramız. Daha fazla anlatmaya gerek yok. Bundan sonrasını yaşayarak öğrenin, ne yazsam spoiler olacak çünkü. Aranızda oynamayanlar varsa (Bu zamana kadar oynamadıysanız seriyi mutlaka oynayın.) oyun zevki kaçmasın. Hikayemiz kısaca bu. 

Eleştiri kısmına gelecek olursak, benim haddime değil. Half-Life 2 beni eleştirsin. Bu oyun tamamen bir başyapıttır. Karakterlerinden tutun, hikayesine; hikayesinden tutun, mekanlarına kadar size her duyguyu hissettirecektir. Grafiklerinden zaten söz etmiyorum bile. Döneminin en iyi grafikleri desek abartı olmaz herhalde.

Oynarken aşırı zevk aldım. Sizler de zevk alacaksınızdır. Oynamanızı gerçekten tavsiye ediyorum. 

(Bitirme sürem 15,8 saat.)

Favori repliğim kesinlikle Barney'den:
"...ve eğer Doktor Breen'i görürsen, ona şu sözlerimi ilet..."

Смысл жи́зни, смысл бытия́ — философская и духовная проблема, имеющая отношение к определению конечной цели существования, предназначения человечества, человека как биологического вида, а также человека как индивидуума.
Вопрос о смысле жизни также может пониматься как субъективная оценка прожитой жизни и соответствия достигнутых результатов первоначальным намерениям, как понимание человеком содержания и направленности своей жизни, своего места в мире, как проблема воздействия человека на окружающую действительность и постановки человеком целей, выходящих за рамки его жизни. В этом случае подразумевается необходимость найти ответ на вопросы:

«Что является целью жизни?» (либо наиболее общей целью жизни человека как такового)

«Зачем (для чего, ради кого) жить?»[1]

«В чём состоят жизненные ценности?»

Вопрос о смысле жизни — одна из традиционных проблем философии, теологии и художественной литературы, где она рассматривается преимущественно с точки зрения определения, в чём состоит наиболее достойный для человека смысл жизни.

Сейчас игра не самая актуальная, но если бы мы были в 2004 году, я бы сказал: КАК?!?!?!? Для 2004 это прорывная игра! А графика и сейчас выглядит свежо. Да, текстуры в низком разрешении, но когда я был совсем мелким школьником (примерно 2017 год) то я думал что тут отличная графика. На халф лайф 2 столько модов, сколько я на другие игры не видел, кроме майнкрафта. Мне очень нравиться геймплей и стилистика. Рекомендую всем!

This was probably my best game I have played. Going through it trying to 100% it was a blast. Normally, I wouldn't 100% games, but this game was so much fun, that I had to do it. You may be asking, ____, you already have 100% games, why must you- SHUT UP. I decided to 100% those games out of spite. But this one didn't make me want to throw myself into a dumpster that is literally ablaze. Overall, I love this game to bits, and we are still waiting for the HL3 (besides HL:Alyx of course), but this series was a blast.

Проснитесь и пойте, мистер Фримен… Проснитесь и пойте… Нет, я не хочу сказать, что вы спите на работе…Никто не заслуживает отдыха больше вашего. И все усилия мира пропали бы даром, пока…
М-м-м… Скажем просто, что ваш час снова пробил. Нужный человек не в том месте может перевернуть мир. Так проснитесь же, мистер Фримен... Проснитесь, вас снова ждут великие дела.
Закончил школу, а 3 халвы все еще нет...

i know this is probably gonna be buried under the pile of manure that is "overwhelmingly positive" and those reviews that go "stop looking at bad reviews & buy the game already XDD!!!!!" but in case someone finds this then i'm just trying to help them decide whether or not to get the game or not. there's the foundation of a epik game here but i can't really recommend. first of all it's pretty buggy, has bad framerate, and some parts that used to work perfectly fine are now a little bit wonky, i think due to updates to the game's engine. even if it works perfectly for you, there are some issues with the core gameplay. the ai is good, and the weapons are fun to use (even if some of them are a little useless), and it's well paced, but often times the maps will consist of these large open areas with relatively little cover strewn about. this means that for most combat encounters, the optimal strategy is to just pick a wall to hide behind and shoot everything that moves. the ai is also seldom given a time to shine due to this. as mentioned before, while fun to use, the weapons tend to be pretty useless in almost all situations. a lot of them act as weaker "precursors" to what you're given later on, although they remain in the inventory until the finale of the game. this means that the gameplay variety is pretty stunted throughout chapters of the game and even between multiple chapters at times. it gets really tedious really fast seeing the same set pieces over and over again, and most of my thoughts i had while playing the game boiled down to "when is this chapter gonna be over i wanna see something different already." finally, while i'm not one to pay much attention to the stories of games as the fun of the game is usually my deciding factor, the characters and story of this game are... almost incomprehensibly annoying. barney is like if you took every shitty white stereotype and rolled it into a greasy ball with a stupid stubble. this game would be 1000% better if you were allowed to kill npcs like in hl1.
